name: Lapsus
description:
L.A.P.S.U.S. (Loops And Portals Synchronized Under Science) is a 2D Multi-Time-Puzzle-Platform game. Think in past, present and future at the same time while you make your way through dangerous and tricky levels set in 4 game-changing worlds, full of new mechanics to face new struggles!

Do you have what it takes to beat the challenges in this time twisted world?


What is the L.A.P.S.U.S Effect?

Well! Our friend Toastie can explain it better? He is quite good explaining one thing or two to Doc!
Don't worry if you don't get the hang of it already! Try the game and you'll be the time expert in no time! 
  • 80 carefully crafted Levels that will challenge your skills in multiple ways!
  • 4 full fledged Worlds with unique aesthetic for this puzzling journey!
  • New game-changing mechanics that will put upside down your knowledge of the world such as the Chronostasis Gun or the Gravity Flipper!
  • Already an expert? Prove it with the Speedrun Mode and challenge other players online! Do you have what it takes to make it to the top of the Leaderboard?
  • Enjoy at the fullest the First World of Lapsus in our Demo which also includes an exclusive Demo Leaderboard! Have a good time, no pun intended!
Observe carefully and do things to be proud of your past self! Try to coordinate with your future self to solve the tricky challenges!   Use all your timey-wimey tools to make your way through the levels!
